addr: 925 Harbor Plz, Long Beach Los Angeles, California 90802
title: California Dance Cruise
desc: California Dance Cruise is an event for every living soul that shares the same love for dance as us. The event will have various different dance styles such as Salsa, Bachata, Kizomba, Zouk, Popping and WCS. We will have the best instructors and DJs in the world. There will be workshops, night parties, pool parties, shows and many more entertaining activities. We are currently selling 30 Early Bird passes and the price will go up after they sell out. We'll be selling similar lots each time we raise the price. VIP passes will also be sold and they give you access to VIP Parties with the instructors, VIP Room with food and drinks, Master Classes, shirts and front row sits during the shows. VIP passes are limited. For more detailed information, please check our facebook event page: https://www.facebook.com/events/124013831290960/
